title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Metacognition-Based Language Education Expertise Development Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and classroom instruction experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more metacognitive-enhanced lessons in a VR simulation environment based on metacognitive educational theory.
Learners can apply and evaluate metacognitive questioning strategies that guide learners' thought processes with 80% accuracy during real-time language instruction simulations.
Learners can write and submit a metacognitive educational effectiveness analysis report through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
